Name: Right Hand
Ingredients: 45 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and/or orange slice wheel.
STRAIN into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).
Express orange zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish, or discard and garnish with orange slice wheel.
Review: This rum-based Negroni may make you wonder why you've been drinking gin Negronis all these years. The Right Hand is usually served straight-up in a coupe but I prefer it tamed by serving on-the-rocks in an old-fashioned glass.
History: Adapted from a recipe created 2007-8 by Michael McIlroy at Milk & Honey in New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Right Hand contains 215 calories
